Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells overexpressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression of the p.G674D variant was reduced by 40% compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to compare protein expression levels between groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 85% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 60% of wild-type.
